snippet: KAYE--Hon. Judith S. The trustees of the William Nelson Cromwell Foundation mourn the passing of their longtime colleague Hon. Judith S. Kaye, an extraordinary leader in public service and private practice. George A. Davidson, Chair John D. Gordan, III, Secretary Charles T. Dowling, Treasurer 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAYE--Hon. Judith S. The trustees of the William Nelson Cromwell Foundation mourn the passing of their longtime colleague Hon. Judith S. Kaye, an extraordinary leader in public service and private practice. George A. Davidson, Chair John D. Gordan, III, Secretary Charles T. Dowling, Treasurer 1/3
